name: PONE
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: A co-op survival horror game where you and your closest friends must work together to survive in an upside down world crawling with the infected.

name: Breadieval
description: Create unique baked goods by combining ingredients you find at the market. Befriend the puppet villagers by baking their favourite recipes or by combining tasty flavours. Have fun, you don't have to follow a recipe here.

name: Vestal
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Family Sharing
description: Vestal is a hand-drawn turn-based rpg with a narrative and artistic focus, set in the rural north of Sweden. You play as Elodie, following her father Karl in his work as a doctor and fallen angel aiding the other fallen of the north. Explore the world, talk to the locals, help them heal.

name: Drown the Bride
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Narrated Game Menus;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: A short interactive adventure about a young actress who must use her wits to prevent her best friend from being murdered.

name: BRESH
description: BRESH is a tactical FPS with teleportation between two universes. Think on two levels. Hide and outsmart. Customize your gear and appearance.

name: Rift Survivors
categories: Single-player;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Touch Only Option;Family Sharing
description: Rift Survivors is a single-player Survivor-like shooting survival game. Journey through shattered worlds and twisted dimensions to reclaim your own. Face enemies that grow stronger with every Rift, and use gear and your inventory strategically to survive until the end!

name: American Comedy
description: You were originally a carefree piece of bread. One day, a group of strange creatures began to destroy your home. You must step forward and fight against them.This is a quirky-style 2D shooting game. There’s only one level. Operation: W A S D to move Left-click to fire Esc to pause

name: Focus Group - First Day
categories: Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Cross-Platform Multiplayer;Custom Volume Controls;Stereo Sound;Partial Controller Support
description: FOCUS GROUP First Day is the free prologue of FOCUS GROUP, a co-op-only puzzle thriller where two players take part in a mysterious corporate stress test. Use communication and logic to solve asymmetrical puzzles. One sees a lever. The other reads the manual. Neither of you know what it does.

name: Claviator
description: A rhythm adventure game where you explore 3D worlds and play through songs solo or with friends in co-op and competitive PvP modes.

categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;Co-op;Online Co-op;Shared/Split Screen Co-op;Shared/Split Screen;Full controller support;Stats;Remote Play Together;Family Sharing
description: 1-4 player online co-op platforming roguelike in procedurally-generated alien caves! Customize your gremlin and embrace the chaos in this roguelike spin-off of Mother Machine.

name: Waldzweisamkeit
